Can you please raise a follow-up PR to add the company and product name into all the `short_descriptions`?

See https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/modules/list_of_network_modules.html this is built from the `short_description`.

A single PR to update all `short_description` for modules in `devel`  would fix this.

This allows people to find the modules when searching

Sure. Excellent idea. I'll ensure new modules contain this info and I'll raise a PR for the ones already submitted. 
Thanks!!!
